title: Pool Party Zilean
body: Now, {{champion:26}} is one of my favorite champions to play because he is bloody hilarious. Now think of Groovy Zilean. Great for lols. Now, think of Zilean in speedos and water goggles. Have I rustled your jimmies? The true troll power of Zilean is yet to be realised!

replies.body: i dont want perverted old cunt in pool party chasing lulu :(...
This is **the** dumbest idea ever zilean is one of the worst champs and you want to waste a_ pool party_ skin on him {{summoner:31}}
This is *the* greatest idea ever zilean is one of the best champs and you don't want an _Ultimate_ skin on him? {{summoner:31}}

> This is **the** dumbest idea ever zilean is one of the worst champs and you want to waste a_ pool party_ skin on him {{summoner:31}}

Zilean is god (of time), we need more zilean skin, Rito pls.
y yu no pali zliena rnakde?
